version_description: Bug fix.

- Added curve feature
- Order and show/hide state of the filters can be synced to cloud

- Added new image editing tools, including split toning, film grain and fade
- Added new textures such as rain, snow etc.
Bug Fix.
Bug Fix.
Bug fix.
Bug fix.

1. Completely redesigned UX for better experience
2. Added more filters (esp. high-quality film filters)
3. Added Community module
4. Added Academy module
5. Added Gaussian blur in Blur tool
Bug fix
Fix bug

1.Support photos in RAW format on iPhone6, iOS10 or later
2.Quick MIX camera access using 3D Touch
3.Bug fix and stability improvement
Bug fix
Bug fix.

1. Support "Save & Replace" in addition to saving a copy
2. Add new Batch Processing feature

1.Added copy/paste edit settings feature
2.Enhanced review/adjust function of batch processing feature
New retouching module supports scribble, spot removal, gradient tools and adjustment brush.
Toolbar can be customized according to user's preference.
Support color in gradient tool

1. Redesigned landing page for easy access to both editing and retouching functions
2. Support B&W mode in adjustment tool of Edit module
Bug fix
Bug fix
Bug fix
New Artistic Filter module, which can transform your photos into pieces of art.
Added filter shop and several new filter packs in Edit module
Fixed a crash that could occur when launching the app after upgrading to v4.6.0
Bug fix
Fixed a crash that could occur when launching the app for the first time
Bug fix
Bug fix
Bug fix
iPhoneX adaptation
Fixed a bug that MIX cannot display built-in images properly after upgrading to iOS 11.2
Bug fix
Fixed a serious black screen issue which happens after upgrading to v4.8.
Added new “Tiny Planet” tool in the retouch module.
Fixed a crash bug when saving images on iOS 13.

Bug Fix.
Bug Fix.
Bug Fix.

• Added a whole new function module that supports graphic design
  - Turn a photo to a nice poster by adding texts, stickers, image mask and textures.
  - A large collection of design templates

• Complete interface revision:
  - Reorganized function modules so that the interface is more concise
  - Support light theme and dark theme

• Editing tools enhancement
  - Support image zooming during editing
  - Improved image processing algorithms
  - Support layer mask

• Resources update
  - More than 100 new filters
  - More than 100 new texture overlays
  - Hundreds of fonts in design tool
  - Tens of image masks and background textures in design tool
  - Thousands of stickers in design tool

• Support CC0 authorization in MIX Community for better sharing

New Features and Improvements:
- Batch-processing
- Enhanced cropping tool
- Resource management in Design module
- Double tap to reset a tool in Edit module

Bug fixes
Bug fixes
- Add new filter

Bug fix
-Fix the bug where mix account can't be associated with an Apple ID
VIP member page optimization
-VIP membership benefits are more obvious
